column1: Uchi////Then they built a Houston Uchi
column2: and it just happens to be 2 blocks from my home. And then I discovered that every single item is essentially perfect. And expensive (but absolutely worth it). Is Uchi a "random Tuesday dinner" place? Not for my budget. But for a special occasion
column3: you know that you will get impeccable service
column5: and possibly the best dessert menu in Houston.
